DOC.brief_summary: To assess which of two commonly utilized insulin drip protocols has better outcomes when used during the labor process.
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison of Insulin Drip Protocols in Labor: A Randomized Trial
DOC.criteria: a. Pregnant patients with either preexisting diabetes or gestational diabetes type A2 who require insulin for euglycemia during labor and delivery a. Those patients who decline participation b. Patients less than age 18 at the time of enrollment will be excluded to protect this vulnerable patient population c. Those patients who cannot be consented d. Patients scheduled for cesarean delivery
